Module app.supernaut.fx
Package app.supernaut.fx

Interface FxLauncher

All Superinterfaces:
Launcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
FxLauncherAbstract, MicronautFxLauncher, SimpleFxLauncher
public interface FxLauncher extends Launcher
Launcher for Supernaut.FX (JavaFX) applications. By using this launcher, your applications can implement the FxForegroundApp interface instead of extending Application and have their constructor dependency injected -- see FxForegroundApp for an explanation of the advantages and details of this approach.
